ALLEGATION:
Youth has been abused by Staff 1 and Staff 2 since being placed at the facility. Staff
physically managed youth at 11 p.m. on 6/17/21. Youth is called names by staff.
INVESTIGATION:
On June 22, 2021 I made an unannounced visit to New Hope Youth Center at
11:30am along with MDHHS worker 1 and another DCWL Child Welfare Consultant.
Interviews
On June 22, 2021 I interviewed Youth A in collaboration with MDHHS worker 1 and
another DCWL Child Welfare Consultant at New Hope Youth Center. On June 29,
2021 I completed a follow up interview with Youth A via Face Time. Youth A
reported that she was not abused by staff while residing at New Hope Youth Center.
She did express concerns regarding a specific restraint that occurred on June 14,
2021 and verbal abuse by staff. It is noted that these concerns are being
investigated under Special Investigation 2021C0112031.
On June 22, 2021 I interviewed Staff 1 in collaboration with MDHHS worker 1 and
another DCWL Child Welfare Consultant at New Hope Youth Center. On June 29,
2021 I completed a follow up interview with Staff 1 via telephone. Staff 1 reported
that she never physically or verbally abused Youth A.
On June 22, 2021 I interviewed Youth B in collaboration with MDHHS worker 1 and
another DCWL Child Welfare Consultant at New Hope Youth Center. She reported
that she never witnessed any of the staff act in an inappropriate manner to any of
the youth at the facility.
On June 24, 2021 I interviewed Staff 4 via telephone. Staff 4 reported no concerns
with other staff members verbal or physical interactions to Youth A.
On June 24, 2021 I interviewed Staff 5 via telephone. Staff 5 reported they have no
concerns regarding any staff abusing Youth A or any other youth at the facility.
On June 28, 2021 I interviewed Staff 3 via telephone. Staff 3 reported that she does
not have any concerns regarding the other staff and Youth A was never abused by
staff while at the facility.
On June 28, 2021 I interviewed Staff 2 via telephone. Staff 2 reported that when
Youth A was initially placed at New Hope Youth Center, she would come to her for
everything, but Youth A would get upset or lie if she was told no or did not get her
way. She would also get jealous if Staff 2 talked to other youth in the facility. Staff 2
3

reported that she had to set better boundaries with Youth A. Staff 2 reported that she
never physically or verbally abused Youth A or any other youth in the facility.
On June 28, 2021 I interviewed Complainant via telephone. Complainant was asked
about concerns of abuse towards Youth A while she was at New Hope Youth
Center. Complainant reported she was concerned about a specific restraint that
occurred on June 14, 2021 and verbal abuse by staff toward Youth A. It is noted that
these concerns are being investigated under Special Investigation 2021C0112031.
APPLICABLE RULE
R 400.4112 Criminal history check, subject to requirements; staff
qualifications.
(4) A person with ongoing duties shall have both of the
following:
(a) Ability to perform duties of the position assigned.
(b) Experience to perform the duties of the position
assigned.
ANALYSIS: The facility is found in compliance as the Complainant, Youth A
and staff denied that Youth A was abused.
CONCLUSION: VIOLATION NOT ESTABLISHED
IV. RECOMMENDATION
I recommend no changes to be to the status of the license of this child caring
institution.
